bibl.title: Some Recent Acquisitions in the Cairo Museum.
bibl.note: 1. A golden girdle from Ptolemaic Egypt (pl. XIII, 1a-c), Cairo Museum, J.E. 89612. -2. A charming glass bust (pl. XIII, 2). Période romaine. J.E. 89659. -3. A terracotta medallion (pl. XIV, 1). Early Ptolemaic period. Cairo Mus., 22/63/2/1. -4. Head of a woman (pl. XIII, 3 et fig 1). Cairo Museum 23/61/11/12 -5. A circular marble bottle (pl. XIV, 2 a-c). Cairo Mus. 23/61/11/22. Roman period.
bibl.seg: El-Khachab Abd el-Mohsen, Some Recent Acquisitions in the Cairo Museum.
JEA 50 (1964) pp. 144-146, 1 fig. et pll. XIII-XIV.

1. A golden girdle from Ptolemaic Egypt (pl. XIII, 1a-c), Cairo Museum, J.E. 89612. -2. A charming glass bust (pl. XIII, 2). Période romaine. J.E. 89659. -3. A terracotta medallion (pl. XIV, 1). Early Ptolemaic period. Cairo Mus., 22/63/2/1. -4. Head of a woman (pl. XIII, 3 et fig 1). Cairo Museum 23/61/11/12 -5. A circular marble bottle (pl. XIV, 2 a-c). Cairo Mus. 23/61/11/22. Roman period.
